name: 2D Platformer Test (Penincillum)
description:
This is a very short basic 2d platform created to be familiar with the Unity Engine. Some minor issues may arise.

Press R to restart the level.

Credits:

 Alvin Roe's Unity - Beginner Platformer Series for majority of the game features

  • Brackey's 2D PATHFINDING - Enemy AI in Unity for the Enemy Ai
  • Ansimuz's Sunny Land Asset Pack for the Visuals
  • B.G.M's Casual Game BGM #5 for the background music
